title: Data not provided by user device

content.question: Adrianna uses RunRoutr to suggest a running route. All compatible users near Adrianna receive a notification that shows her running route. Which of the following data is not obtained using data collected from Adrianna’s smartphone but necessary for RunRoutr to share Adrianna’s running route?

choices.label: The current locations of other RunRoutr users
The usernames on Adrianna’s contact list

content.answer: The current locations of other RunRoutr users

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Generalize data sources through variables.
